FuncDef: This command displays active subscriber information for a subscriber.
CLIs: subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ] detail
subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ] mirror

ParaDef.Info: The subscriber ID of the active subscriber, up to 32 characters.
Displays the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Displays the existing SLA profile name, up to 32 characters.
Displays subscriber information for sessions with the specified SPI sharing type. Values-per-group, per-session-ipoe, per-session-ppp.
Displays subscriber information for sessions with the specified SPI sharing type and sharing identifier. The SPI group ID is:. Values-0 to 4294967295.
